pkgmetadata.longdescription: Consistency in the Analytic Hierarchy Process // A set of three functions for 'AHP' users, namely CR() which evaluates the Consistency Ratio for a given 'PCM', improveCR() for any input 'PCM' suggests a matrix with preferences similar to the original preferences, having greater consistency than the input matrix and sensitivity() for an input 'PCM' returns the average rank correlation of the principal eigenvector of the input 'PCM' and of 500 sample matrices generated by random perturbations of elements of the input matrix to within the five nearest elements in the Fundamental Scale.
